description: Returns information about the publishing destination specified by the provided destinationId.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the detector associated with the publishing destination to retrieve. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

parameters.name: DestinationId
parameters.description: The ID of the publishing destination to retrieve.

nested_items.name: DestinationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the publishing destination.

nested_items.name: DestinationType
nested_items.description: The type of publishing destination. Currently, only Amazon S3 buckets are supported.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the publishing destination.

nested_items.name: PublishingFailureStartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time, in epoch millisecond format, at which GuardDuty was first unable to publish findings to the destination.

nested_items.name: DestinationProperties
nested_items.description: A DestinationProperties object that includes the DestinationArn and KmsKeyArn of the publishing destination.

nested_items.name: DestinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource to publish to.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key to use for encryption.
